name: Blob Driver
description:
Experience the thrill of driving as a Blob! Level up your car to gain speed -- and customize to your heart's desire!

Earn money by typing  -- how educational! :D

R to restart, P to Pause. (And Space to Pause during the Typing Game)

Have fun!

___________________________________________________

Please note, I only created some of the art assets like the Blob Players, Wagons, and Hills. 

Audio: Pokemon Black and White, Plants vs Zombies, Unity (TheFatRat), Nancy Drew: The Deadly Device.

Thank you to all art assets utilized.
